sqlMap.select:
SELECT FROM SUB_MER_RATE WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_RATE.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(RATE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rate_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#trans_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRACT) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) Like '%'||(#mcc_category_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_RATE) Like '%'||(#sign_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#sign_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#sign_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#sign_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_RATE WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_RATE.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(RATE_TYPE) Like '%'||(#rate_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE) Like '%'||(#trans_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#trans_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L1_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l1_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_L2_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_l2_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUB_MER_TRACT) Like '%'||(#sub_mer_tract:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MCC_CATEGORY_ID) Like '%'||(#mcc_category_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_RATE) Like '%'||(#sign_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_RATE_H) Like '%'||(#sign_rate_h:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#sign_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SIGN_LOWEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#sign_lowest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
